title: New Document Format
description: An improved way to work with files

features.title: Important Change
features.description: Old .txt files can now only be opened through import

features.title: New Features
features.description: Customizable section icons and improved organization

features.title: Import Documents
features.description: Select File → Import... from menu and specify .txt files

features.title: Automatic Conversion
features.description: The app will create a new document in .nlist format

features.title: Save New File
features.description: Press ⌘S or select File → Save, then specify name and location
